roadSigns.title: Stop Sign
roadSigns.dec: A red octagonal sign that indicates to stop completely.

roadSigns.title: Yield Sign
roadSigns.dec: A triangular sign indicating to give way.

roadSigns.title: Speed Limit
roadSigns.dec: A circular sign indicating the maximum speed limit.

roadSigns.title: No Parking
roadSigns.dec: A sign indicating that parking is not allowed.

roadSigns.title: One Way
roadSigns.dec: A sign indicating that traffic must move in one direction only.

roadSigns.title: Pedestrian Crossing
roadSigns.dec: A sign indicating a designated crossing for pedestrians.

roadSigns.title: Railroad Crossing
roadSigns.dec: A sign indicating the presence of a railroad crossing.

roadSigns.title: School Zone
roadSigns.dec: A sign indicating an area with a school and children present.

roadSigns.title: Slippery When Wet
roadSigns.dec: A sign indicating that the road may be slippery when wet.
